info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 25 at 11:01PM CST until November 27 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL CALDWELL...SOUTHEASTERN HAYS AND NORTH CENTRAL GUADALUPE COUNTIES... At 1101 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Zorn, or near San Marcos, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... San Marcos, Kyle, Lockhart, Martindale, Uhland, Staples, Zorn, San Marcos Regional Airport, Maxwell, Hays City, Reedville and Redwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
